Uses of Class
org.xadisk.connector.outbound.XADiskUserLocalTransaction

Packages that use XADiskUserLocalTransaction
org.xadisk.connector.outbound   
 

Uses of XADiskUserLocalTransaction in org.xadisk.connector.outbound
 

Methods in org.xadisk.connector.outbound that return XADiskUserLocalTransaction
 XADiskUserLocalTransaction XADiskConnection.getUserLocalTransaction()
          Returns an instance of local transaction object which can be used by JavaEE applications to control the transaction on this connection by themselves (in a resource-local way, not using XA transaction).
